message.name: ERR_COST_FV_START_DATE_EMPTY
message.locale: Cost estimation failed for case %1s. No case start date recorded.

message.name: ERR_ESTIMATECOST_FV_EXPECTED_END_DATE_EMPTY
message.locale: Cost estimation failed for case %1s. No case expected end date recorded.

message.name: ERR_NO_EVALUATION_DATE
message.locale: A date on which to check eligibility must be entered.

message.name: ERR_CASEEVIDENCE_XRV_UNAPPROVED
message.locale: Unapproved evidence has been found. Eligibility cannot be determined until this evidence has been approved. Please contact the case supervisor.

message.name: ERR_NO_DELIVERY_PATTERN_ON_DATE
message.locale: The delivery pattern selected for this case, has no value on '%1d'. Please select a different delivery pattern for this period.

message.name: ERR_CASENOMINEEPRODDELPATTERN_XRV_NO_DELIVERY_PATTERN_ON_DATE
message.locale: There is no valid delivery pattern for the case on '%1d'. Please enter a different eligibility date.
